subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer fell to Rafael Nadal, 5-7, 3-6, in a semifinal match at the ATP World Tour Finals, an event Federer has won a record six times.
snippet: Roger Federer fell to Rafael Nadal, 5-7, 3-6, in a semifinal match at the ATP World Tour Finals, an event Federer has won a record six times.
